titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Records of the Theatre Arts Department, University of Pittsburgh Johnstown, 1973- UPJ.2010.01
titlestmt.author: David Kupas.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-07-08 08:25:56 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Records of the Theatre Arts Department, University of Pittsburgh Johnstown
did.abstract: The Records of the Theatre Arts Department at the University of Pittsburgh Johnstown consist of stage production photographs, rehearsal photographs, stage production videos, rehearsal videos, stage production programs, newspaper clippings, marketing materials, and production notes for performances produced by the University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown's Theatre Arts Department, dating from 1973 to present.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: The Records of the Theatre Arts Department consist of stage production photographs, rehearsal photographs, stage production videos, rehearsal videos, stage production programs, newspaper clippings, marketing materials, and production notes dating from 1973 to present. Newspaper clippings, marketing materials, production notes, and production videos are few. The records are arranged in chronological order and housed separately by medium type.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Records of the Theatre Arts Department, 1973 – , UPJ.2009.01, Pitt-Johnstown University Archives, Owen Library, University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Sara Herr in 2014. The collection was further organized and the finding aid created by David Kupas in 2017.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Donations are added to the collection every year. These donations come from the Theatre Arts Department and Owen Library staff. If you are interested in donating materials to the collection, please contact the Archives & Special Collections staff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series of photographs is arranged in chronological order and housed by medium type (photographs, slides, contact sheets and negatives, or photographs saved to compact discs). They contain stage production photos and rehearsal photos.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series of videos of stage productions is arranged in chronological order. Included within the series are Golgonooza one-act performances written and directed by students of the University. N.B. VHS videocassettes have been transferred to DVD format.

unittitle.emph: Fear and Misery in the Third Reich

scopecontent.p: This series of programs is arranged in chronological order.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series of newspaper clippings is arranged in chronological order. The majority of the clippings are not properly labeled with the title of the newspaper from which it was clipped or the date. When possible, a preservation photocopy of the original article was made.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series of marketing materials is arranged in chronological order and housed by medium type (playbills or postcards).

Fear and Misery in the Third Reich

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series of production notes and announcements is arranged in chronological order and housed by medium type.
